titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Captain Charles Pasley, Acting Envoy Extraordinary to Persia

mods.abstract: The letter outlines shipping movements and communications into and out of Bushire. William Bruce provides an update on the Persian troops that are arriving at Bushire to garrison the coast, mentions that Jaffer Ali Khan [Ja‘afar ‘Alī Khān] is in a critical situation at Sheraz [Shiraz] and that the British position at Bushire is looking increasingly precarious. It further outlines the measures he has taken in case the Residency should need to be evacuated.
